name: STEM CELLULAR Anti-Wrinkle Moisturizer
about: What it is:A bestselling moisturizer, infused with plant stem cells and vitamin C, thatu2019s clinically demonstrated to visibly reduce wrinkles and promote smooth, plumped-looking skin..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, and Combination.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness, and Uneven Texture.Formulation:Lightweight Cream.Highlighted Ingredients:- Plant Stem Cells and Grape Juice: Are rich in antioxidants that fight visible signs of aging..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:One jar of this wrinkle-fighting wonder is sold every 4.5 minutes. A proprietary blend of plant stem cells and vitamin C infused into organic resveratrol-rich grape juice improves the appearance of skin tone and luminosity while organic jojoba oil and shea butter hydrate and moisturize..Clinical Results:In a 6-week instrument-measured study and consumer-panel test by a third-party lab:
ingredients: -Plant Stem Cells and Grape Juice: Are rich in antioxidants that fight visible signs of aging..-Vitamin C: Visibly brightens and evens skin tone..-Jojoba Oil and Shea Butter: Nourish and promote a smooth, supple-looking complexion...Pyrus Malus (Organic Apple) Juice*, Vitis Vinifera (Organic White Grape) Juice*, Citrus Medica Limonum (Organic Lemon) Juice*, Organic Aloe Barbadensis Juice*, Caprylic/Capric Triglycerideu2020, Simmondsia Chinensis (Organic Jojoba) Seed Oil*, Cetearyl Alcoholu2020, Glyceryl Stearateu2020, Stearic Acid, Glycerinu2020, Helianthus Annuus (Organic Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Ethylhexyl Palmitateu2020, Xanthan Gum, Butyrospermum Parkii (Organic Shea) Butter*, Malus Domestica (Apple) Fruit Cell Culture Extractu2020, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Fruit Cell Extractu2020, Citrus Medica Limonum (Lemon) Leaf Cell Extractu2020, Tocopherol (Vitamin E)u2020, Oenothera Biennis (Organic Evening Primrose)*, Linum Usitatissimum (Organic Linseed) Oil*, Borago Officinalis (Organic Borage) Seed Oil*, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Ethylhexylglycerinu2020, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate (Vitamin C), Panthenol (Vitamin B5), Allantoin, Citrus Reticulata (Mandarin) Oilu2020, Litsea Cubeba (May Chang) Oilu2020, Cinnamomum Camphora (Ho Wood) Oilu2020...*Certified Organic..u2020Plant Derived.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply generously to a clean face, neck, and decollete...Beauty tip:.-If your skin needs extra-juicy moisture, mix with two pumps of Stem Cellular SUPERGRAPE Youth Renew Serum (sold separately). ..Juice cleanse routine: .-Apply Stem Cellular Anti-Wrinkle Booster Serum (sold separately)..-Apply STEM CELLULAR Anti-Wrinkle Eye Treatment (sold separately) and follow with STEM CELLULAR Anti-Wrinkle Moisturizer...Recycling Instructions:.-Place empty container in recycling bin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes
reviews.review_text: Love this face moisturizer, love the scent, the way it dispenses from the container, giving you the right amount needed. Quick results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using it for several weeks, Iu2019ve noticed a significant improvement in the texture and brightness of my skin. The combination of organic ingredients like malic acid and aloe makes it effective yet gentle enough for my skin. Though I experienced slight tingling during the first few uses, the results were worth itu2014my skin feels smoother, and my dark spots have visibly faded.  I also love that Juice Beauty stays committed to clean beauty principles, using natural ingredients and eco-friendly packaging. Their Stem Cellular Anti-Wrinkle Booster Serum is another gemu2014it absorbs quickly, leaves my skin feeling firm, and has a subtle glow that I really appreciate. Itu2019s a great option for anyone looking to address early signs of aging without exposing their skin to harsh chemicals.  Overall, Juice Beauty is a fantastic option for anyone looking to switch to a clean beauty routine without sacrificing effectiveness. I highly recommend their products, especially if you're looking for skincare solutions that balance natural ingredients with noticeable results.

reviews.review_title: A New must have for me

reviews.review_text: This product feel fresh on my skin, love the smell and the mess free package

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this product except the smell! Its way too lemon-y. But the feeling on the skin is amazing. I felt refreshed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample of Juice Beauty Stem Cellular Anti-Wrinkle Moisturizer from BuzzAgent platform for my honest review and I am loving this cream. Although I have only been using it for a week, I can see the difference it has made to my fine lines.  My skin feel moist and softer than ever. I definitely recommend this cream to my family and friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Juice Beauty kindly gave me this Stem Cellular Anti-Wrinkle Moisturizer for free so that I could review it, and Iu2019m ever so grateful that they did!  This is the second product that Iu2019ve tried in their Stem Cellular line and Iu2019m yet to be disappointed. After using this product over the past four weeks, I am loving the results that Iu2019ve been seeing. My skin appears to be much more hydrated and glowing. I did not mind the citrusy scent from the vitamin c ingredients but a word of caution - use sunscreen, as I had forgotten to do so and burned my face the first day I used this. Totally my fault!   I did very much enjoy the packaging with using a pump to access the product. One pump dispersed enough of the moisturizer to use on my entire face & neck. I would definitely purchase this product without hesitation and have already recommended it to a few folks already.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for a few weeks and Iu2019m pretty happy with the results. It is very hydrating, and the smell is very pleasant, albeit a little strong.  I feel that my fine lines and wrinkles have softened, my skin feels plumper, looks visibly brighter, and it has a more even appearance. Overall I would recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this face cream for a few weeks. I am in love. The beautiful and fresh lemon scent is refreshing and invigorating. The texture feels whipped and it hydrates my skin so well. I am noticing a difference already in my fine lines.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent this product in exchange for an honest review.  I enjoy the lotion itself. My only negative is the smell is so strong. It smells like Iu2019ve put a cleaner on my face and not in a great way. Luckily Iu2019ve had a cold so itu2019s been a bit easier to test it out. The product itself is great but the scent could use some toning down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: When I received this product, I was really excited. I love the packaging. I love the feel of the lotion. It made my skin really moisturize, and it went in the skin really nicely. The only negative thing I have to say is I canu2019t handle the scent. Iu2019m a big fragrance person and love scent, but the lemongrass almost has a skunk sent to it that I donu2019t like at all so I have to give this cream away unfortunately. Other than the scent, the product is beautiful

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved using this. It goes on smooth and has an amazing fresh scent. It left my skin feeling soft and moisturized. The pump system is easy to use and you get the perfect amount everytime.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I just started using this product for the first time and I love it. Not only does it smell amazing but it makes my skin feel soft and hydrated all day long! I would definitely recommend this cream.

reviews.review_title: Luxurious cream, but a bit heavy

reviews.review_text: This products smells gorgeous and makes my skin look lovely, but it is fairly heavy and does not absorb immediately.  Over the last few weeks I have not noticed any difference in my face, but it does feel luxurious to use.

reviews.review_title: Very nice texture and I see improvement in my skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this face cream for a few weeks now, and I'm absolutely loving it! The texture is rich and luxurious, absorbing quickly into my skin without leaving any greasiness. My skin feels soft, smooth, and supple, with a noticeable improvement in fine lines and wrinkles.  The cream has a subtle, pleasant scent and is gentle enough for my sensitive skin. I've also noticed an improvement in skin tone and brightness, giving me a more radiant complexion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Highly impressed with this product not only did it smell delicious, but made my skin feel smooth and hydrated, I would definitely recommend it to a friend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I will say, I received this product for free in exchange for leaving a review. I did end up really liking this though. I can't afford the current price, but it is a good cream. The scent is really nice, probably my favourite out of all I've tried. Non-greasy, absorbs well. Does wonders for my dry skin, especially on my forehead. I'd switch to it permanently, but my budget is more in the fifty dollar range unfortunately. If you have the means, it's a nice cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I hate having to dig into a jar to use a product, so I was pleasantly surprised this one had a built-in pump. My skin is quite sensitive, and not once did the STEM CELLULAR Anti-Wrinkle Moisturizer bother it. The moisturizer left my skin feeling light, not oily or weighed down and went on very smoothly. This is definitely going to be a repeat product in my beauty tools!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My first impression was the subtle sweet smell. I would describe it as lime meringue pie, if that was a thing.  My second impression was how soothing it feels going on, and also how my skin feels hydrated all day.  The push applicator is amazing and keeps everything clean and tidy.  I love this cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and this moisturizer does such a great job at keeping me hydrated throughout the day. It has the most lovely citrus scent and feels fantastic once absorbed into the skin. This is the second Juice Beauty product that I've tried and they never disappoint. Not to mention, the packaging is so gorgeous with the top pump that gives you exactly the right amount of product - no excess waste. I absolutely would recommend this product to anyone who has mature skin and needs a little extra oomph out of their moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have enjoyed using this moisturizer. The scent is nice not to overpowering. I was a bit worried about that.  The right amount comes out every time.  Easy to use but yet probably more plastic is used in packaging. My skin is hydrated and soft to the touch not greasy.  I haven't noticed allot of change in my skin but the product is moisturizing and doing a good job.  I will continue to use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a FREE jar of Juice Beauty Stem Cellular Anti-Wrinkle Moisturizer in exchange for my honest opinion of the product. I have used the product for 15 days straight.  (Usually, I like to give a product a few months of trial before I leave a review) It's a thicker lotion but goes on smoothly and feels light in the skin.  The first thing you will notice is the fresh, citrus smell.  I do not like scented products, but it is not overpowering and smells fresh, and the smell seems to dissipate once on the skin. In the short time I have used the Stem Cellular product I feel that my face looks brighter, and possibly a bit plumper.  I will continue using the rest of the jar to see if my skin looks and feels plumper.  This container I feel will last many months, and so far, I would recommend   I have added the ingredients to my review so you can see how great they are!! Juice Beauty proprietary blend of fruit stem cells: apple buds, grape buds & lemon leaf. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: Fresh, light & moisturizing on my sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So I used this for 5 weeks two times a day and these are my thoughts:  As a person with sensitive skin, I found this cream to be non irritating and calming to my skin. I love that the cream is not super thick and spreads nicely and evenly on my skin. It has a fresh smell which goes away in minutes as the cream completely absorbs into the skin in minutes. Also, although they suggest to use the product liberally, a little does go a long way. The packaging is very nice and I like the pump dispenser. It's easy to get the amount of cream I need without waste. I don't have a lot of wrinkles, but I found my skin looked brighter and and was extremely well moisturized all day (and night with a second application after cleansing). Overall I really loved the cream, its definitely a luxury purchase but I would buy it with my own money and would recommend it to my friends and family who are looking for a face cream.  The only downside I can say is that with the pump dispenser, I can't tell when I'm almost done and need to get a refill.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I think this moisturizer is just okay. Itu2019s a little thicker than I normally like. The scent is a VERY strong citrus scent. I would not buy it due to the strong scent. I prefer my face creams to be lightly scented. The trial period wasnu2019t long enough for me to say whether I thought it made a difference in my fine lines.    Please note that I received this product for free in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is a big hit in my books!  From the simple packaging, dispensing pump to ensure the product is kept clean, and the hydrating, dewy finish, I thoroughly enjoyed this moisturizer.  Even though I do not normally like scented products, I found the light citrus scent to be refreshing, and not too strong!  The product texture itself might also be a bit thick for some, but I found it great for my dry skin, and I will definitely be making use out of it in the fall and winter months!

WOW! Iu2019m a man who is almost 60 and people in the street are asking me how I keep my skin in such a wrinkle-free state! Iu2019m absolutely convinced that this little bottle of cream has magic ingredients because before I started using it I had those neck and throat lines and my skin seemed to have lost its elasticity to bounce back but this product gave me ten years of my face back and Iu2019m ud83dudcaf serious ud83euddd0  When I first opened the canister, I had serious doubts that this was not going to to anything but give me a greasy pillow at night but it didnu2019t! My skin drank it in like a thirsty desert and I always feel like Iu2019m giving myself a little spa facial at night and it smells just like a facial too! But the disappearing wrinkly skin and dehydration are gone and Iu2019m hooked on this product for life. My rooster neck is gone too! My whole face and neck look so much better and I know itu2019s this special beauty product that did it! People in my apartment building are asking me why my face looks vibrant and smooth and thatu2019s all I need to prove this truly gave me back my youthful complexion. After all, Iu2019m a man and never expected anyone to notice. Itu2019s truly a wonder of nature that Iu2019m going to recommend to all my friends and family. Thanks Sephora!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been loving the Juice Beauty Stem Cellular Anti-Wrinkle Moisturizer! I especially appreciate the dewy, bright finish it gives me.  The citrus scent is revitalizingu2014though it might be a little strong for some. But overall, itu2019s a great touch that makes the experience feel more luxurious. Iu2019m also impressed with the packaging! It ensures I donu2019t waste any product, and it keeps everything stable for longer use. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have extremely sensitive skin, and this cream did a great job of keeping my skin happy. Very rich and moisturizing, and gentle enough for sensitive skin. The one thing I didn't care for is the scent. It is quite strong, and I think it's a popular floralish scent, but I just personally don't care for it, but my family seems to love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am actually obsessed with this.  I just got back from a week in Florida in august.  My skin was TERRIBLE.  I looked forward to my shower and skincare every night and this was the only moisturizer I brought.  For me itu2019s the scent. Itu2019s super citrusy which is my favourite scent so for me itu2019s a win.  Will definitely keep this in my skincare routine.

reviews.review_title: an 'ok' cream, likely not a repurchase

reviews.review_text: I received this product for free, in exchange for my honest review. I used it for about 2 weeks and didn't really see any impactful changes. I feel like it's an ok cream, non greasy, and absorbs quickly, not convinced that it offers any real benefits besides moisture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Another great product from Juice beauty. I love the airless pump packaging, it helps keep the product stable and sanitary. It is a lovely experience applying it and it has the most beautiful texture. It rubs in effortlessly and leaves my dry skin feeling soft and hydrated all day. It also feels so refreshing to apply. I took off one star because the fragrance is a little strong, like citrus peel or lemongrass. Even though Iu2019m a citrus fan, I think it could be toned down a bit.   I received this product in exchange for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was very impressed with this moisturizer. With the first application, I noticed my skin was smooth, and the citrus smell was really great. The dispenser gives you the right amount of the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the packaging and it dispenses the right amount of product. It has a faint citrus smell and glides on smoothly. No greasiness or residue. I have sensitive skin so it worked well. My skin stayed mositurized until the next morning. Overall i love the product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this cream ! As soon as you apply it on your face it gives you the smoothest skin texture ever , the citrusy scent I love so much hydrates your skin very well !!! I got this product free for an exchange of my honest opinion! Glad to leave a 5 start review !!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019d really like this moisturizer itu2019s not sticky or heavy itu2019s very light has a nice citrus scent I really like the pump packing that you donu2019t have to use a lot of it u2026I took, the pump cover off the container it is full of product not half like a lot of the pump type moisturizers ,it does moisturizer now does it get rid of wrinkles no it does give a brighter look to your face ,will be prevent them unsure as that would take years to know lol if you want a nice light fruity scented moisturizer this is for you .

reviews.review_title: A good product other than the strong citrus smell
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried a few different products from Juice Beauty and I really enjoyed them, but this one misses the mark for me. It feels light and non-greasy when you put it on which is nice , but the main issue I have with it is the citrus smell. I find it overwhelming and it didn't seem to diminish. If you don't mind a strong citrus smell I think this would be an amazing product. It left my skin feeling soft and looking glowy. I just couldn't get past the smell but if you love citrus you'll love this !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's difficult to say whether the product is helping after using daily for 3 months as my skin looks the same. After all, the product is an anti-wrinkle moisturizer but doesn't state it'd reduce wrinkles.  As a moisturizer it's not powerful enough on my very dry skin. Even in the summer, I've had to use vitamin E oil in conjunction with the product to keep my skin hydrated. So, unless you have oily or combination skin, this may not be the right product for you.  The product has a pump action to release the ideal amount of cream and keep the remaining product clean. I do like that function as it makes applying the product easy. However, I imagine there will be wasted product left in the container given you can't wipe out every bit of it. With that said, having used this daily for 3 weeks it hasn't run out yet.  The aroma will be a hit or miss with people. I love citrus so don't mind the really lemony scent. For some, they may find it too cloying and a bit like dish detergent. Perhaps reducing the scent or bringing it from lemon to more of a general citrus would be better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this moisturizer. I really have dry patchy skin, so this cream felt so rich and soothing. I used it every morning and night. It also smells really good, which is always a plus.

reviews.review_title: Get This On Your Face ASAP
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried lots of creams and lotions over the years, so I was a little skeptical. I have to say that I was impressed. It gies on like silk, absorbs quickly and leaves my skin feeling super hydrated. I went to dinner with a friend the other night and she commented on how great my skin looked, so it must be doing something! The applicator bottle is a must. I hate when you have to dip into a jar of moisturizer. This jar pumps out the perfect amount everytime. I would have given it 5 stars but the scent is a but much. It's not unpleasant, but it is very strong. I would definitely recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

Not only does it make my skin feel super hydrated it makes my skin smooth and look brighter. It doesn't feel greasy or heavy at all! I will definitely purchase this when my freebie runs out! Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using it for couple of times, I am writing this review. It is gentle on the skin and has a mild fragrance. Results are slow but since I have sensitive skin it has not irritated my skin. It provides elasticity to the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smell awesome and leaves my skin feels soft and smooth .The reduction in fine lines around my eyes completely disappeared.I'm very happy I got chosen to test this wonderful product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been testing the STEM CELLULAR Anti-Wrinkle Moisturizer by Juice Beauty for a couple of weeks now and I love how lightweight the moisturizer is. It packs a powerful punch without leaving a greasy residue on my skin. Although it may take more than a few weeks to review the accuracy of the anti-wrinkle feature of this moisturizer, what I can mention is that I typically have very dry skin and have noticed that my face still looks fresh at the end of the day. The citrus scent is such a pleasant way to wake up to in the morning. The best thing about this moisturizer is the bottle. I love that I simply have to push the top down to release the perfect amount of moisturizer on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got the Juice Beauty STEM CELLULAR Anti-Wrinkle Moisturizer 2 weeks ago, & I love Sephora products in general, but I am wowed by the results! I wasnu2019t expecting miracles, or my youth restored by 20 years or anything, but I noticed a change in my skinu2019s hydration and plumpness quickly. You never have to guess how much product to use. Press the top and it squirts out the amount you need. It also keeps contaminants out of the jar. Just donu2019t be overzealous and pump vigorously like I did or youu2019ll end up with moisturizer all over the counter.   I am a big fan of lemon and this moisturizer comes in a fresh lemon scent. It applies like a dream and one dollop does my entire face and neck area.   Itu2019s important that me skincare is derived from organic and natural sources as much as possible. This moisturizer contains 70% organic ingredients.  It is also great for my sensitive skin. I have had no breakouts or burning while using this product.  My skin has been plump, and soft and very hydrated since I began using it morning and night as part of my daily skin routine. Iu2019ve also noticed my skin is less red (I have rosacea) Iu2019ve been able to got out this summer without throwing on a tinted foundation to cover the redness. Itu2019s a great bonus for me.  I will add this to my skin care routine once I finish this sample. I am throughly impressed.

After just a few weeks, my skin looks more radiant and smoother.  Iu2019ll admit, the price point is a little on the higher side, but honestly, it's worth every penny. The results are worth it, and itu2019s now a must-have in my skincare routine. Iu2019ve already told my friends and family about it, especially those who prefer clean beauty products. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this Juice Beauty Stem Cellular Anti-Wrinkle Moisturizer for FREE in exchange for my honest review. This is my first time using an anti-wrinkle moisturizer. I just turned 40 years old so I have been more aware of my fine lines and wrinkles on my face. I was excited to use this product to see positive results. I used it for approximately 4 days consecutively in the morning after I washed my face. I took a before and after photo to see the difference. I noticed that prior to using this product, I had lines on my forehead whenever I smiled. After using this product a couple of days later, those lines significantly disappeared. They did not disappear entirely but there were less visible lines. This is good progress! I did notice that the scent from this moisturizer reminded me of citrus. I usually prefer non-scented products because I have sensitive smell. It only slightly bothered me at first because it gave off a strong citrus scent. After a couple of days use, I just got used to it. However, if it was lightly scented or non-scented, I think I would have rated it higher. I look forward to continuing to use this facial moisturizer and hopefully I will see long-term positive results. Here's to looking young!

reviews.review_text: I was gifted this face cream for free from BzzAgent and Juice Beauty in exchange for my honest review. I have dry and sensitive skin. The first few weeks of using this cream went great. I liked the fruity scent and it absorbed quickly upon application. It was a nice lightweight day cream. However, after a while of everyday use I noticed that it was causing some redness, irritation and dry tightness in my skin. So, I stopped and did some reading to figure out what was causing that because the first few weeks I had been ok. Some people suggested to try and only use it 2-3 days a week and see if that goes back to being ok. So that is what I have been doing and so far, it is working. I do want to finish the jar to give it a chance to see the anti-aging benefits. If you have sensitive skin just be aware of that but if you have normal skin this will probably be a nice cream for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a moisturizer from Juice Beauty for review, and after using it for a few weeks, I can confidently say that it helps diminish discolouration and makes my skin glow! As someone with sensitive and reactive skin, I was initially cautious about trying a new product. However, this moisturizer has been a pleasant surprise, with its sensitive-skin-friendly ingredients like shea butter, vitamin E, and aloe juice.  One of the things I appreciate most about this moisturizer is its lightweight formula. It provides just the right amount of hydration, making it perfect for daily use. I particularly enjoy using it as a base for my makeup, as it adds a subtle glow to my look. Plus, the light scent is refreshing and makes the entire experience even more enjoyable.  If you have drier skin, I recommend using this product as a first-step moisturizer or in place of your serums and then applying a thicker cream to seal and protect your skin. I do this on cold Canadian winter days, and it works wonders. I also brought this product to Florida on vacation and found it perfectly hydrating in the warmer weather.  Trying out this product has been a pleasure, and I wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone looking for a moisturizer that nourishes and makes the skin glow.

reviews.review_title: A Winner in My Skin Routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample of Juice Beautyu2019s Stem Cellular Anti Wrinkle Moisturizer in return for an honest review. It replaced my current moisturizer for ten days, using the full 50ml jar in that time. I liked that the formula was organic, had vitamin c, was loaded with antioxidants and plant stem cells to combat dryness, uneven texture, fill lines and wrinkles, brighten and tone skin overall. My skin has been dry with lines, wrinkles, sun damage and an uneven texture and dullness. I used this product twice daily under makeup and at bedtime. The formula was nice and light, non greasy and my skin soaked it up. It had a light citrusy scent and felt like menthol on my skin. Like no other moisturizer Iu2019ve used, this felt so good on my skin. It was the perfect base for makeup and I did not have to touch up or reapply during the day. I used to have to double cleanse at bedtime but did not have to while I used this moisturizer. Iu2019d apply this again at bedtime and did not feel the tight, itching feeling on my face like before.  After Iu2019d used the whole product I have to say that it did indeed feel plump and hydrated, my skin is smooth, feels and looks soft, even and bright, fine lines are less defined. I am not surprised that this formula worked for me considering how well itu2019s ingredients targeted my problem areas, and in the short time I used it. I will continue to use it and recommend to everyone with dry or combination skin types because it worked so well for me.

reviews.review_title: Some results in reducing dark spots after 10 days
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have received this product for free in exchange for my review. I am 40 years old, have dry skin and visible signs of aging, like fine wrinkles, some redness and discoloration and a few dark spots. I have been using this product in the morning and evening for 10 days, without any other products that I usually use. What I really liked about this product is its ingredients list, it does not contain any harmful chemicals. It has a mild citrusy smell (which I liked) and a medium rich consistency. I felt that it needed some extra time to get completely absorbed into my skin. I have also felt a tightening feeling on my skin after a few minutes of applying. As I have only used it for several days, it might be too soon to tell, but what I have noticed is more even tone of my skin and reduction in some of my dark spots. My skin felt hydrated after, even a bit greasy. If you have oily skin, you might not like this product. I have not noticed any visible signs regarding my fine lines and wrinkles yet, but I did not have any expectation in that area anyway, as I do believe there is nothing that can be actually done with cosmetics alone (without using fillers or Botox). The downside of this product is its price. The products I was using before trying this one did not cost as much, but on the other hand, this one did outperform in the areas of discoloration and dark spots reduction. So, if you want good product with quality ingredients and your main area of worry is hydration and dark spots, I would recommend trying out this product.   The left picture was taken before trying the product and the right one was taken after 10 days of continuous use. I did not wear any make and did not use any filters.

reviews.review_title: A must-have cream for age defying

This age-defy hydrating moisturizer is supercharged with a blend of vitamin C and fruit stem cells, infused into an organic resveratrol-rich grapeseed formula that can help minimize fine lines and wrinkles. This potent formula has a lightweight creamy, non-greasy texture, which spreads smoothly and absorbs easily. Not to mention, the pleasant fruity, citrus scent and cooling sensation make it an ideal moisturizer for my morning skincare routine, leaving my skin refreshed, supple and hydrated, perfect prepping under makeup. Plus, I'm really impressed by the airless pump top jar, making it mess-free, hygienic and convenient. Highly recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with the Juice Beauty line for their unique and effective formulations and clean, organic, high-quality ingredients! I was super intrigued to try the STEM CELLULAR Anti-Wrinkle Moisturizer, which promises to combat signs of aging while nurturing the skin with potent botanicals and plant stem cells.   First and foremost, the packaging is so elegant and practical - the moisturizer comes in a sleek pump bottle, ensuring hygienic dispensing and easy application. The texture of the cream is luxurious and quite thick that glided effortlessly onto my skin. It absorbs quickly without leaving any greasy residue, which is a big plus for someone with combination skin like mine. One of the standout features of this moisturizer is its formulation. It's made with organic ingredients and plant stem cells derived from fruits like grapes and apples, which are rich in antioxidants and nutrients. I did an in-depth check of the ingredients and it is absolutely packed with emollients and humectants, mainly oils, which is extremely nourishing to the skin. At the same time, these comedogenic ingredients can be triggering for those with oily skin prone to fungal acne.  I started noticing visible improvements in my skin's texture and tone after just a week of applying it day and night. My fine lines appeared less noticeable, and my skin felt firmer and more hydrated overall. What impressed me the most was the long-lasting hydration it provided throughout the day. This is definitely a premium product, but a little goes a very long way! I'd say it's worth the investment.

reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Bzzagent in exchange for my honest review. I have been using this cream daily for one week now and I am so impressed. It keeps my skin so hydrated throughout the day leaving if feeling soft or irritated because I have sensitive skin. I would have to test it longer to know whether it makes a difference on fine lines and wrinkles but I can feel my skin is already firmer. Also I love that this cream is cruelty free and made from organic ingredients. It is rated highly on the Yuka app. I definitely recommend.

The cream absorbs really well, not greasy or pilling.(I have not used this under make up, so I canu2019t say how that would sit.) I appreciate that it leaves my skin very soft and smooth without any residue quickly after application. I found it to be quite soothing as well when I used it post a BBL treatment, and my cheeks were quite red and irritated/hot. The amount of moisturizer that automatically comes out is perfect for me, but the container easily opens if you prefer to scoop it out as well. All in all, I think this is a lovely moisturizer and will likely purchase once my sample runs out!

reviews.review_text: I have had the opportunity to try the Juice Beauty STEM CELLULAR Anti-Wrinkle Moisturizer, which I received complimentary in exchange for an honest review. I have used this daily moisturizer for just over a week now and I am very impressed with the noticeable improvement in my skin texture. I have dry to very dry skin and my skin is now soft to touch which is attributed to this wonder cream!   The reason I didnu2019t give this moisturizer 5 stars is mainly because of the overwhelming scent. I also would need a bit more time to see the effectiveness of the anti-aging component to know itu2019s worth the high price point.   It is definitely a new contender in my skincare routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a fortunate recipient of the STEM CELLULAR Anti-Wrinkle Moisturizer through BzzAgent and Juice Beauty's testing program, I embarked on a journey to unveil the secrets of youthful radiance.  From the moment I applied this moisturizer, I was greeted by its luxurious texture, which effortlessly melted into my skin. Enriched with a potent blend of organic botanicals and fruit stem cells, it felt like a nourishing elixir for my complexion.  One of the most remarkable aspects of this product is its ability to combat signs of aging. Over time, I noticed a visible reduction in the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, leaving my skin smoother and more youthful-looking.  Furthermore, I appreciated its lightweight formula, which provided ample hydration without feeling greasy or heavy on my skin. It served as the perfect canvas for makeup application, allowing for a seamless and long-lasting finish throughout the day.  What sets STEM CELLULAR Anti-Wrinkle Moisturizer apart is its commitment to clean beauty. Free from harmful chemicals, synthetic fragrances, and parabens, I felt reassured knowing that I was nourishing my skin with pure, natural ingredients.  In conclusion, STEM CELLULAR Anti-Wrinkle Moisturizer by Juice Beauty has exceeded my expectations in every aspect. From its efficacy in reducing wrinkles to its dedication to clean beauty, it has become an essential component of my skincare routine. I highly recommend this product to anyone seeking to rejuvenate their complexion and embrace the beauty of natural skincare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had the opportunity to try the Juice Beauty STEM CELLULAR Anti-Wrinkle Moisturizer, which I received complimentary in exchange for an honest review. I was impressed by the fact that this product is vegan and formulated with organic ingredients, aligning with my preference for natural skincare products. I also loved the scent and packaging of this product. The packaging makes it so the product comes out of the top with the pump. Very sanitary and easy to use.  One of the standout features of this moisturizer is its lightweight and non-greasy formula. I have combination dry skin and I found that it provided long-lasting hydration without leaving a heavy residue on my skin. I also appreciated the subtle and pleasant scent of the moisturizer, as well as the smooth and soft feeling it left on my skin. The absence of glycerine was noticeable and added to the overall quality of the product. It exudes a higher-end feel, making it worth the investment for those looking for effective skincare solutions.  While I can't speak to the long-term results in terms of wrinkle reduction, I believe that consistent use over time may yield promising outcomes. Overall, I am satisfied with the Juice Beauty STEM CELLULAR Anti-Wrinkle Moisturizer and would recommend it to friends with various skin concerns. I look forward to continuing to use this product and hope to see the results it promises unfold.

reviews.review_title: Excellent moisturizer, loved the formula & scent!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and Juice Beauty in exchange for my honest review, and I am so happy I got a chance to try it because the Stem Cellular Anti-Wrinkle Moisturizer has become one of my all-time favourite skin care products!  The moisturizer spreads smoothly and easily, and is absorbed quickly with no greasy residue. It delivered powerful hydration that visibly reduced any dry areas. It works well under makeup, leaving a smooth finish. I did notice that my T-zone became shinier more quickly while using this moisturizer, but it wasn't enough of a problem for it to detract from my overall positive opinion. I really enjoyed the citrus scent of this product, although it may be a bit strong for those with sensitive noses.  I love that Juice Beauty's products are cruelty free and that they use natural ingredients. The container is well-designed and easy to use.  I would definitely recommend the Stem Cellular Anti-Wrinkle Moisturizer to anyone who has dry or combination skin. I will definitely be purchasing this for myself tonjse again in the future

The citrus smell is amazing. It's not too thick. Moisturizes well. Makes you feel refreshed. I didn't notice much difference in appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Pricepoint is high for a moisturizer that didn't help with my lines and wrinkles as it claims to do.

reviews.review_title: Clean, lightweight and sweet lemongrass scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Without my regular trips to the spa for facials (thanks COVID). My beauty regime moved 100% to DIY status. I am always on the lookout for high quality products, especially in the clean beauty space. If you enjoy the scent of lemongrass - you will love this cream! It is lightweight and all of the ingredients are organic, but it does some heavy lifting while you sleep to bring in some much-needed moisture. For the price though not sure I would buy it over some other creams on the market at a similar price point. Thatu2019s said the ingredients are clean, efficacious and efficient and it smells so damn good. Worth testing out of you want to treat yourself to a splurge. Note that I received the product complimentary for testing purposes from Influenster and Juice Beauty. That said, my  review is honest and I hope it helps.

This has a nice clean scent and goes on smoothly with a good consistency. Itu2019s just that I have other moisturizers that are similar in benefits. If you donu2019t have a moisturizer in your regime or are looking for a new one to improve the look of your skin then yes I would recommend but if your happy with the moisturizer your currently using then stick with the one you have and maybe get your hands on the overnight serum instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: * I received this product complimentary for testing purposes from #Influenster and #JuiceBeauty in exchange for my honest review* Overall, I found this product to be fairly moisturizing and found that over a period of about 3 weeks, it brightened my skin and improved the texture. This product is lightweight and does not leave any unpleasant heaviness or sticky residue on my skin. I have pretty dry skin, and I found that this was not heavy enough for my winter dryness, so I will save the remainder of the product for the summer when I prefer a lighter-weight moisturizer. It does have a strong citrus scent, but it did not irritate me. I think many customers will enjoy the pump-style packaging of this product, as I often read reviews where people say that they donu2019t like sticking their fingers into little pots of product. I prefer the pots, as I like to know that Iu2019m getting every last drop of product. Obviously, having the Clean at Sephora stamp of approval is a huge plus.  I do recommend this product and look forward to going back to it in the summer.

It has a strong citrus scent that reminds me of the yellow jolly rancher. Itu2019s a super sweet scent that smells up the entire room. I usually prefer unscented skin care products but even if itu2019s scented maybe just a light fresh scent. This scent is too sweet and overpowering and that is why I gave it 3 stars. I used this combined with the overnight toner and I will say that my skin looks brighter and refreshed in the morning but thatu2019s all I can see so far as I donu2019t have wrinkles but I do have fine lines under my eyes and they are still here and popping unfortunately.

reviews.review_title: Smooths and brightens while still hydrating
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster for testing purposes.  I really like it and it does what it claims to do: reduce fine lines, hydrare and brighten. I was expecting it to be drying because of the vitamin C but it is quite moisturizing. I have sensitive skin and I hesitate trying new skincare when my skin is behaving. I deducted 1 star because the first week I used it, I had a couple of breakouts.  But I kept at it and don't get breakouts from it anymore. I like to use this with the matching serum as it is most effective. Be careful though as you can really feel it working and some people may not like the burning feeling. I'm used to it and prefer it as I know it's actually working. The feeling only lasts about a minute for me. It really helped smooth and brighten my skin. The fragrance is a bit too strong for my liking but for the results it gives, I can tolerate it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

It leaves my skin feeling soft and fresh and it works well under makeup.  The smell is very strong but I actually love it and look forward to smoothing it on my face everyday!  The citrus smell provides a fresh pick me up each morning and you can actually feel the product working!  If you can handle the heavy fragrance then I would definitely recommend this product!  The packaging is a little different since you press down on the top to dispense the product and it often leaves a mess on top but it's easily wiped off.

reviews.review_text: The thing I personally enjoyed the most about the Juice Beauty products is the scent.There's a light refreshing scent of fruits and for some reason, I keep smelling a hint of ginger. I love it. I received the Anti-Wrinkle Moisturizer from the Influenster in exchange for an honest review of the products. I must first note to you all that thia product is organic, vegan and cruelty-free.  I used the Anti-wrinkle moisturizer every morning for the past few weeks. The color resembles light green tea and when I apply it, it feels light and non-oily. It absorbs into the skin relatively quickly though I would not recommend just relying on this one product to moisturize your skin for the day, especially during winter. It would probably be better during summer.  In the short term, due to the retinol, I did notice some flaking at first but it got better as time progressed.  I did also notice that the lines on my face decreased. Overall, I'll give it a 4/5 for now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for about a month now and I really like it it is not heavy on face which is amazing as I have combination skin and I break out a lot. But love how my skin feels after this hydrated and plumped and the texture is more smooth. It does have a nice scent to it not too strong. Definitely would recommend it! I got this as a gift but definitely will buy it again because of the results!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complementary for testing purposes but all opinions are my own.   I am really happy that I now know of this brand. I love how they use organic ingredients. This moisturizer worked great on my skin and instantly felt the hydration. My skin felt smoothing and more tight. However I only gave it a 4 star because in combination with the overnight serum I didn't see any improvement in my fine lines. The smell of this moisturizer is amazing too. It smells fresh and citrus. I like the pump like application as well! Great texture of moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I would not buy it due to the price. I got a free sample from Influenster.  I found that my skin is too sensitive for the moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free through Influenster to try. I absolutely loved the feel and smell! I am extremely sensitive to smell and had no issues. My skin is also annoyingly extremely sensitive, no issues. I do live in Edmonton, Alberta and this was not quite moisturizing enough, but DEFINING helped. I noticed my skin feeling better almost immediately.   My only negative was the amount. I believe as though I used as directed and it barely lasted a couple weeks. I guess it was a smaller size than normal (15ml), but I just cannot justify the cost for how much product you get. Unfortunate.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My new favourite! I have added this product to my nighttime routine and it is a game changer. It has left my skin smoother and firmer. I also love the smell!

Got this full-size product to try from Influenster, it Is a  good moisturizer and doesn't irritate my sensitive skin, my skin feels refreshed feels on, and still feels moist the next morning, Iu2019ve had no dry skin since using it. I like it absorbs well and light lemon scents Will definitely be getting more of this cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and I am glad for the opportunity to get to know this amazing brand. The container works very well. There is a pump, so it avoids that you touch and contaminate the product that you will not use. the texture's feel is amazing. The product is absorbed instantly! At first I though it would not be enough for the dry winter season, but I was wrong.  The product keeps my skin moiturized.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: again I received this free products from influenster and I do like this product I like the scent it is more citrusy more like lemon and lime again it feels really nice on the skin is very lightweight are uses at night time

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster. The product has a very strong fragrance, kind of like a household cleaner. I could smell it through the sealed package. I have sensitive skin and didnu2019t dare put it on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is a good moisturizer, the packaging is very nice and the cool inner pump system distributes the perfect amount and prevents product contamination. I really like that, and I also love that they use clean ingredients!   However it does have a strong perfume (it smells delicious, like a fresh lemon dessert, but it is a strong scent). If you are sensitive to perfumes like I am, it is best to use a small amount as a day cream.   I have been using it for a few weeks and have not noticed any major changes in my skin. It hydrated well and is nice to use under makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this moisturizer from Influenster to try out but havenu2019t seen many results unfortunately. Normally scent doesnu2019t really bother me but I do not like the smell of this product as it reminds me of a lemon household cleaner. I will continue to use the remainder of the product and if I find different results I will post a second review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Nice light weight moisturizer, scent is a strong citrus smell. I honestly havenu2019t noticed a noticeable difference in the fine lines in my forehead. Nice moisturizer tho.

reviews.review_title: Great addition to my nightly routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this for a nightly moisturizer, I wake up with my skin feeling plump and moisturized.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was a decent moisturizer, nothing to write home about. I felt it absorbed well into my skin and it felt decently hydrated. I love when jars have push pumps like this, I find it cuts down on waste and keeps the remains product clean and untainted. I'd recommend this to anyone looking for a mid range moisturizer that's looking for hydration. But don expect drastic results with your wrinkles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this moisturizer from Influenster and Juice beauty. I must say that I loved the packaging of this moisturizer and the pump top! I loved the scent, very fresh and citrus scented. I have used this product everyday, both morning and night, and I must say my skin is so soft! My husband even told me he could feel the difference. The only thing I noticed with my combination skin is that I did have a few breakouts in the beginning but after a couple of weeks my skin adjusted to it. I would definitely recommend this moisturizer,  especially because it is crulty free and vegan

reviews.review_title: feelin my plump skin! bye bye dry patches!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Full disclosure. I received this item complimentary from Influenster for review purposes. Iu2019ve been using this product consistently for about two months. The product itself glides on like a dream. Itu2019s super hydrating. I have combination skin but dry patches. Ive noticed the following differences in my skin: a noticeable plumpness, no more dry patches, smile and laugh lines smoothened out and the bonus.. a more even skin tone. I have been using this in combination with the overnight retinol serum. The dispenser is unique and is the highlight of the packaging. The rest of it feels a bit cheap and my cap cracked. The dispenser always produces the right amount of product. The smell is lovely, and oh-so-lemony. Despite itu2019s packaging, I would purchase. I havenu2019t used anything that fully elongates my dry patches so this is game changing for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Juice Beauty STEM CELLULAR Anti-Wrinkle Moisturizer a few weeks ago as a complimentary gift from Influenster, and it has been a part of my nighttime skincare routine ever since. The first thing you will notice is that it comes in an easy press pump dispenser which I appreciate u2014 it makes the packaging look very sleek. The consistency is very thick and it melts onto your skin. It has been keeping my skin extremely hydrated, especially since itu2019s freezing outside at the moment. Non-greasy, but it somehow gives my skin a natural glow which I am here for. I quite enjoy the citrusy lemon leaf extract scent I get while applying it, but if youu2019re sensitive to strong scents, you may want to grab a tester beforehand. I will certainly purchase this as soon as I run out u2014 I love this so much. Highly recommend this gem.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Please note I received this product complimentary for testing purposes. Nice sleek packaging and easy press pump that dispenses product efficiently.  Product smells glorious in what I would describe as a lemon verbena scent, very fresh! Product glides on easily and soaks right into your skin leaving face dewy and what I would describe as almost lightly matted.  Used in combination with the complementary overnight serum, after using  this for almost a month, Iu2019ve noticed a smoother and more even appearance to my skin.  I donu2019t have to wear makeup over this my skin looks so good,  just a dusting of mineral sunscreen and Iu2019m glowing.  Noticed a definite difference in the plumpness of my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a complimentary product thanks to Influenster in exchange for my honest review, and I couldnu2019t be happier!! This is a great moisturizer, everything from texture, absorbency on the skin, fragrance, and ingredients makes it a DEFINITE new favourite on my skincare list. I have very fine lines that are almost not there anymore after using this moisturizer for about a month now! I will definitely repurchase. My one and only con is that it doesnu2019t have SPF in it; so what Iu2019ve done when using it during the day is just mixing it with my regular face sunscreen (:

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Influenster for an honest review. I really enjoyed the packaging. The pump was my favourite part, it was sanitary and resembles the Drunk Elephant moisturizer packaging. The scent was nice, light citrus scent. My last moisturizer did not have fragrance so it is a nice switch up. In terms of moisturizing, I donu2019t think Iu2019ve used it long enough to see the full benefits, but it absorbed nice and paired well with the serum. For an extra kick of moisture I paired with a hydrating sleeping mask! Overall I enjoyed using this product and would repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free for testing from influenster.  The packaging is really nice and that's all.  I have oiky skin and it doesn't moisture  my skin at all.  Plus,  it has a very strong citrus fragnance.  My skin felt so dry after applying this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Full disclaimer: I received this product for free from influenster in exchange for my honest opinion. My favourite thing about this moisturizer is the dispenser; it's a sanitary pump, helps preserve the active ingredients, and helps you measure the amount you actually need for your face. From the onset there is a strong citrus smell after applying but it does seem to fade away within 30 minutes. The moisturizer has a nice texture and does get absorbed by my skin nicely. The reason I can't give this a full five stars is because my skin starts to feel tight and dry within four or five hours after I apply it. It could have to do with the face that I live in a cold climate and this moisturizer might preform better for me as a summer product instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So I will start by saying that i havenu2019t been using this product for long enough to see long term results. I have been using it for about 3ish weeks.   But It definitely has made my skin more plump and hydrated, I do not have a large amount of wrinkles or fine lines but I do see that it has made a difference in my smile lines with regular use.   I live the smell of it - bright and citrusy, like apple like or something.  It does a great job of moisturizing and keep the skin looking fresh ans plump.   I did receive this product from Influenster for my reviewing purposes but all opinions are my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the packaging that this cream comes in. Airtight with a pump is the most fun way to use a moisturizer! This moisturizer does have a strong lemon scent , I honestly donu2019t mind it at all and it reminds me of a scent from my childhood that I canu2019t put my finger on.  The pump delivers the perfect amount of moisturizer for my face an neck, it is a very thick consistency. It leaves me hydrated with soft skin. I havenu2019t seen a huge improvement with wrinkles as of yet but as itu2019s only been a month. This is only getting a 4 star as the scent makes it unusable to consumers that are highly sensitive to scents in skincare. . . This product was sent to me complimentary on behalf of @influenster for review.

reviews.review_title: Not moisturizing enough for dry skin.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Influenster and Juice Beauty. I love the packaging and application of this product since it dispenses the perfect amount and you donu2019t have to put your fingers in a jar, but I donu2019t think itu2019s moisturizing enough for dry skin. My skin didnu2019t feel plump and hydrated like it does with some other face creams. It smells really good though and might add enough moisture for those with oily or normal skin type.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this product for a month or more and I have actually had people ask me if I had Botox or similar treatment. It really helps get rid of the little fine lines (especially around your mouth and eyes). Great hydration for the harsh winter months. I would purchase this for myself as I was provided mine for #free #complementary via #influesnter

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary product from Influenster and have been pleasantly surprised by how much I like this moisturizer. The harsh Canadian winters have a huge impact on my skin and this moisturizer has helped keep my skin hydrated. Itu2019s thick without feeling heavy on my skin and I love the fresh lemon scent. I also love the dispenser and the fact that Iu2019m not having to stick my hand into a container like other products. Would definitely recommend to anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for complimentary from influencer. Here is my honest review; I really did love and my skin feels very soft. In the winter I prefer a thicker moisturizer due to the harsh cold dry winters we get where I live.  I noticed that I never got dry spots around my nose and mouth that show up every winter.  I personally love citrus smell. I only have one dislike about this product and thatu2019s the dispenser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary courtesy of Influenster. I throughly enjoy the scent of this product and the dispenser it allows me to control the amount of product without having to contaminate the whole jar by reapplying. I also like how this is an organic product. I love how the moisturizer isnu2019t to thick and doesnu2019t leave my skin feeling overly oily and it absorbs nicely into the skin. I have been using it for a few weeks and enjoy how it makes my skin feel. I do not have any wrinkles or fine lines so I cannot speak on its effectiveness with those. However I enjoy it as a daily moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this moisturizer for free in my VoxBox, and I am so glad I did!  I can honestly say that I loved this moisturizer!!!  The smell was fruity and the moisturizer felt amazing on my skin!  I have sensitive skin and it did not irritate it at all which was a nice surprise.  I have noticed an improvement in my skins texture and the wrinkles I am slowly developing were showing signs of plumping up!  This is a new favorite of mine!  The only reason I have it 4 stars, is the price for the size of the product is a bit shocking... But you get what you pay for!  And this is one of those products that lives up to that saying!  I would definitely recommend this to someone wanting to prevent wrinkles and help with the moisture in their skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster for a fair and honest review   First the smell of the moisturizer is to overpowering for me . I donu2019t like the smell of lemon and this smells like a fresh cut lemon .  I tend to have dry skin during winter so I have a few dry spot and this moisturizer worked well hydrating my skin and clearing the dry patcher . The lotion isnu2019t too thick which is nice and absorbs well by the skin .  I really dislike the dispenser .. I donu2019t like the push button because I feel like product is been wasted by smearing on the dispenser and also you have to clean it well after each use otherwise the lotion creates a crust and on your next usage it will be mixt in . I would much prefer and open bottle or a squirt bottle . I also did not notice any difference of wrinkles or fine line   Overall  i have been using this product for 3 weeks ( 2 times a week ) and I havenu2019t notice any changes in fine line or wrinkles . Iu2019ll keep using it and see if there will be results in the long run but I wouldnu2019t purchase this product but it was a nice moisturizer.

reviews.review_title: Will be buying over and over
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for an honest review,and Iu2019m so grateful that I did! Not only did I fall in love with this product but I have since purchased some other products from this line.  This is much thicker then my usual moisturizer and it took awhile to get used to.  With regular use I found that my makeup went on so much nicer.  I also noticed that I never got dry spots around my nose and mouth that show up every winter without fail.  I love the fresh smell...such a change from the flowery smell of my usual Moisturizer.  I only have one dislike about this product and thatu2019s the dispenser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this free to try from Influenster~  I have breakout prone skin but this didn't bother me at all. It was so hydrating for my dry skin without being too heavy & it absorbed into the skin pretty quickly.  The fragrance was okay but I prefer my skincare without, either way...it didn't bother me. Also loved the container, it made getting out the right amount each time very easy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this moisturizer, I have really sensitive skin. It works well for me, I usually use it as a night cream.
